description: The image shows the cover of a book titled "Double-Consciousness and the Rhetoric of Barack Obama: The Price and Promise of Citizenship" by Robert E. Terrill. The title is split into two parts with "DOUBLE-" in blue and "CONSCIOUSNESS" in red. The subtitle is written in smaller black text below the main title. The author's name, Robert E.
